description:
Weslie and Wolffy are accidentally transported to fifteen years later. In order to return to their own time and space, the duo and the future sheep collect the scattered fragments of the Elephant Star Stone and assemble the Elephant Star Stone. However, during the collection process, the mysterious villain also sends his powerful henchmen to snatch the fragments, so the two sides start an exciting battle for the fragments.
source: bgm.tv/deepl

BAIDU_BAIKE: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之决战次时代

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Juezhan Ci Shidai
喜羊羊与灰太狼之决战次时代
